data.question: What is the empirical formula and formula weight of [Zn2(1)2(NCS)4]n?
At what temperature and wavelength was the single crystal X-ray diffraction data of [Zn(2)2(NCS)2]n measured?
What crystal system and space group does [Agn(3)n(OTf)n]m belong to?
What is the unit cell dimension 'a' for [Agn(4)n(NTf2)n]m?
How was the absorption correction applied to [Zn2(6)2(NCS)4]n?
What is the final R index for [Agn(7)n(NTf2)n]m for data greater than 2σ(I)?
What is the largest diff. peak and hole for [Zn(8)2(NCS)2]n?
What method was used for the refinement of [Agn(10)n(NTf2)n]m?
What is the crystal size of [Agn(11)n(NTf2)n]m?
How was the structure of [Zn2(12)2(NCS)4]n solved?
What was the final R indices for [Zn2(12)2(NCS)4]n for all data?
What was the method used for data collection of [Zn2(12)2(NCS)4]n?
What was the temperature during the data collection of [Zn2(12)2(NCS)4]n?
What type of steric zipper interaction is observed in the crystal structure of peptide 3?
What is the significance of the Ramachandran plots shown in Figure S38?
data.answer: They indicate that all the plots from the first to third residues appeared in the β-sheet region, though the fourth residues were widely spread due to the free rotation of methyl ester groups at the C-terminal.

data.question: What does the dispersion energy calculation reveal about the steric zipper interactions?
data.answer: The dispersion energy calculation reveals that interdigitation and hydrophobic contact are the two types of steric zipper interactions, with their energy values indicating the stability of these interactions.

data.question: True or False: The crystal structure of [Agn(11)n(NTf2)n]m was solved using the Patterson method.
True or False: The crystal structure of [Agn(10)n(NTf2)n]m was solved using the dual space method.
True or False: The crystal structure of [Zn2(12)2(NCS)4]n was solved using the dual space method.
True or False: The crystal structure of [Zn2(1)2(NCS)4]n was solved using the Patterson method.
